meaningMnemonic: The kanji means <kanji>doubt</kanji>, so this is just that as a verb. So this means <vocabulary>to doubt</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>to suspect</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>to be suspicious of</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: There's reason <vocabulary>to doubt</vocabulary> that you can teach an <reading>u</reading>ni <reading>Taga</reading>log (うたが), but once you try, it's actually not that hard. They're very good listeners after all.
